about_the_game:
You're a filmmaker and you recently purchased a box of VHS tapes at a flea market.

Now you need to look through them and select tapes on which occur mystical, violent, inexplicable scenes, in general everything that can interest the viewer.

Style:

This game is more of an “experience” than a game. Imagine you have found something you shouldn't have. Now you looking at something very dark, something forbidden, you know its wrong and you should not watch this, but you dont know why, you also cant stop watching. In the end you close the video, but that feeling of unease stays with you for a while. 

That's what this game is about.

Features:

This is the DEMO version for the game BANNED TAPES.

The demo is different from the full game, here you will be able to familiarize yourself with the opening acts of the main game.

  • Simple intuitive gameplay.

  • Creepy atmosphere in the best traditions of such movies as Skinamarink, V/H/S and others.

Gameplay:

You watch different tapes and decide which ones to keep for your movie, if you choose tapes on which nothing happens, you will lose, but you also need to not overlook interesting tapes with mystical, violent or other kind of interesting scenes.

name: BANNED TAPES Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12450H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE RTX™ 3060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game was tested on a gaming laptop with 6 GB of video memory

short_description: You're a filmmaker and you recently purchased a box of VHS tapes at a flea market. Now you need to look through them and choose those tapes that have horrible, mystical, violent events on them.... This is a demo version with opening acts of the main game.
